Title: Mrs. X at the Gaslight
Writer: Sheila R. Lawrence, Amy Sherman-Palladino (created by)
Actors: Rachel Brosnahan, Alex Borstein, Michael Zegen, Marin Hinkle
Plot: Midge finds a different kind of audience to perform for, much to Susie's chagrin. Abe gets offered the experience of a lifetime. The Weissmans come together for a family dinner. Susie finally shows off her management skills.
